title: Analytical DB
pageDescription: Arenadata DB is a powerful distributed analytical database based on Greenplum as a managed service. It is a massively parallel DBMS with linear scalability. Arenadata DB is used in mission-critical systems with large amounts of data, and is 20% faster than other DBMS.
shortDescription: Powerful distributed analytic database for large projects powered by Greenplum
metaDescription: Arenadata DB is a powerful distributed analytical database based on Greenplum as a managed service. It is a massively parallel DBMS with linear scalability
markdown: Arenadata DB is a powerful distributed analytical database based on Greenplum as a managed service. It is a massively parallel DBMS with linear scalability. Arenadata DB is used in mission-critical systems with large amounts of data, and is 20% faster than other DBMS.
